title: Addiction
lyrics: Intro:   Neo eopsshi tto saldabomyeon jeul kkeo ra nan mi deonneunde Shwipkke kkeu nheul su eom neun keopicheoreom Nuneul tteumyeon tto saenggangna Eojjeomyeon Midaero Nege jungdok ttwen saramcheoreom Dan haru rado neol bol su eomneun nan Sara nael su eopsshi Neol saranghaesseo huhweneun eopsseo jewa neon anirago maraedo Eotteoke naega neol jeulleonji Geu ma-eum hanaro nunmurinde Saranghae niga eopttamyeon Neon jugeotttamyeon dareun gidae-eopsshi Geuri-ume neoreul weonmanghaneun il Eopsseosseul na-iltende Wae iri tto yawingeoni Gakkeum apeugido haneunji Nege ikssukhan jjalbeun gamgicheoreom Neoreul jeul sun eopkketjji Eojjeomyeon idaero Nege jungdokttwen saramcheoreom Dan haru rado neol bol su eomneun nan Saranael su eopsseo Neol saranghaesseo huhweneun eopsseo jewa neon anirago maraedo Eotteoke naega neol jeulleonji Geu ma-eum hanaro nunmurinde Saranghae niga eopttamyeon Neon jugeotttamyeon dareun gidae-eopsshi Geuri-ume neoreul weonmanghaneun il Eopsseosseul na-iltende Baby ne ver can’t see you again And so i just can’t forget of my life Every thing in my life For you love i can give Anything left in my life
